text: Uumamni lubbuu4:7 His 1:10 qabeessi jalqabaa leenca, inni lammaffaan sangaa fakkaata ture; inni sadaffaan fuula akka fuula namaa qaba ture; afuraffaan immoo risaa4:7 risaa – (Leenca, sangaa, nama, risaa) afran isaanii iyyuu tokkummaadhaan guutummaa uumamawwan lubbuu qabeeyyii tokko taʼanii Waaqa galateeffatan sanaa iddoo buʼu. barrisu fakkaata ture.
